Name: Grosvenor cocktail
Ingredients: 30 ml Punt E Mes vermouth amaro
5 ml Torabhaig Peated Single Malt Whisky
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: On the bitter side of bittersweet, this is a great aperitivo cocktail.
History: Adapted from a recipe by Alex Kammerling. He originally used an extra 1/2 shot of Kamm & Sons but as it is his brand we'd not criticise him for a generous pour.
